Noun: a round shape formed by a series of concentric circles (as formed by leaves or flower petal)
American chemist who with Richard Smalley and Harold Kroto discovered fullerenes and opened a new branch of chemistry (born in 193)
a strand or cluster of hair
Verb: form a curl, curve, or kink
shape one's body into a curl
wind around something in coils or loops
twist or roll into coils or ringlets
play the Scottish game of curling
